Text:
Anyone played this successfully with wther VLC or Mplayer ? My Mplayer claims it canÂ´t find either a video, nor audio stream. VLC manages to find the DTS audio track but no video.
Help would be appreciated.

ABSOLUTELY works....you just have to do a little digging:

First, you need HDTVPump:

http://www.dvbportal.de/projects/hdtvpump/

And then (At least for any HD-DVD releases by HDTV_CHINA i have) you need Matroska Splitter

http://haali.cs.msu.ru/mkv/

You will also need to have a MPEG2 decoder previously installed. NVIDIA's works. If you can play a DVD - chances are you have a valid decoder.


Install those and report back!

KMPlayer to play HD from HDTV CHINA
http://kmplayer.kde.org/download.php

If you download those 3 and install them all downloads from HDTV CHINA will work Have downloaded 40 and all works
Okey, i imagine the aim is to create a perfect copy of a HD DVD, so on this subject can someone please inform on how to burn this with an HD DVD burner to play it on a HD DVD Drive...
You can`t this is not a hd dvd

Help, done all above and I have an MOEG2 Decoder
does not work, bit of a disappointment after a 20+GB download!
Scrub that, now working in MP Classic.

all you need:
good enough comp
remove all crap codecs
install cccp
